channel.title: Projects on Diwakar Sharma
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Diwakar Sharma

item.title: Project : Python- Laptop promotional offer
item.description: Create a Python script to find a laptop for a given price from laptop promotional data stored in csv file . Evaluate and implement methods to make the script run faster use of class() and functions() and methods() Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project : SSIS- Data Pipe Line
item.description: Create a SSIS data pipeline to import data in multiple csv files and store the cleaned data in a database in Microsoft sql server. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project : Bank Customer Analysis- Tableau
item.description: Data collected by web scrapping using python Data visualization in Tableau Link to Tableau Profile

item.title: Project : BitCoin Analysis - Python
item.description: Data scrapping using Python -Pandas Data cleaning using Python Data analysis, visualization using Python - Matplotlib Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project : Covid-19 Data Analysis - Power BI
item.description: Covid data imported from csv files Data cleaning/transformation done in PowerBI query Top 10 most affected countries shown. Dashboard is interactive, the time line history shows that covid cases followed the same trend for all the countries. It took about a month to reach peak , which is constant for most of the countries Link to Power BI Profile

item.title: Project : Data Analytics in Digital Marketing-Excel
item.description: Created a macro to import raw data(csv files) Created a pivot table to organize the data. Created a slicer to identify the top affiliate for the current week. Data analysis to know the overall performance Data visualization, created charts for the final findings. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project : Covid-19 Data Analysis - Tableau
item.description: Data collected by web scrapping using python Data visualization in Tableau Covid data (UK) analysis Link to Tableau Profile

item.title: Project : Sales Data Analysis
item.description: Sales data for a company was analyzed to give insight into the sales trend for different regions to help in making the future investment decision Link to Data Studio Report
